cause.description:
Dogwood holds corporations accountable for their impacts on Southern forests and communities. Through grassroots pressure, we can create real and lasting change.
1. Southern forests are too important to be wasted for packaging.
2. Packaging should have more recycled content, not more virgin forest
3. Forests should be managed sustainably, not clearcut for packaging!
cause.mission: Protect Southern forests and communities from unsustainable, industrial logging practices
cause.name: Dogwood Alliance
